item.description:
A romantic comedy with Meryl Streep, Tommy Lee Jones & Steve Carell... Yes Please... !! Here is a link to the movie so you can check it out:
http://movies.yahoo.com/movie/great-hope-springs/

At this time the movie is scheduled to play at 4:45pm on Sat Aug 11th. I will be at the theatre at 4:15pm if the movie is playing downstairs I will be in the downstairs Lobby. If the movie is playing upstairs I will be in the seating area there. We will head in to the movie at 4:30pm.
After the movie we can gather just outside the theatre and go grab a bite to eat.
item.name: Hope Springs - Romantic Comedy
